products.name: BrocareLs+
products.composition: Ambroxol hydrochloride, levosalbutamol, and guaiphenesin syrup

description.short: Ambroxol hydrochloride, levosalbutamol, and guaiphenesin syrup is a combination of three medicines that treat coughs.
description.long: BrocareLs+ is a powerful combination medication designed to effectively treat various types of coughs. It contains three active ingredients: Ambroxol hydrochloride, which helps to thin and loosen mucus, making it easier to cough up; Levosalbutamol, a bronchodilator that helps to open up the airways; and Guaifenesin, an expectorant that helps to loosen phlegm.

usage.instructions: Take this medication by mouth as directed by your doctor. Do not increase your dose or use this drug more often or for longer than prescribed.
usage.side_effects: Common side effects may include nausea, vomiting, stomach upset, dizziness, or headache.
usage.precautions: Before using this medication, tell your doctor or pharmacist your medical history, especially of: heart problems, high blood pressure, diabetes, overactive thyroid.

products.storage: Store in a cool, dry & dark place. Protect from direct sunlight. Keep medicine out of reach of children. Do not chew or crush the capsule. It should be swallowed whole.

manufacturer_details.name: Saphnix Life Sciences
manufacturer_details.address: Village-Barotiwala, Paonta Sahib, Distt. Sirmour, Himachal Pradesh-173 025

marketing.address: Mantra City, Ranipur Range, Haridwar, Uttrakhand, Pin-249403

reviews.comment: Works well for my cough, but causes slight drowsiness.
Excellent product! Cleared my congestion quickly.

products.name: SmraFlam
products.composition: Aceclofenac IP 50 mg, Paracetamol IP 125 mg

description.short: SmraFlam Suspension contains Aceclofenac and Paracetamol, ideal for relieving pain and inflammation.
description.long: SmraFlam is a suspension containing Aceclofenac and Paracetamol. It is designed to reduce pain and inflammation effectively. Aceclofenac is a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID), while Paracetamol is an analgesic and antipyretic.

usage.instructions: Shake the bottle well before use. Administer the prescribed dosage as advised by the doctor. Do not exceed the recommended dose.
usage.side_effects: Common side effects may include stomach upset, nausea, dizziness, or rash.
usage.precautions: Inform your doctor about any liver conditions, kidney issues, or hypersensitivity to NSAIDs before use.

products.storage: Store in a cool & dark place. Protect from direct sunlight, heat & moisture. Keep the medicine out of the reach of children.

manufacturer_details.name: Algen Healthcare Limited
manufacturer_details.address: Vill. Khara Khari, Sadhaura Road, Kala Amb, Distt. Sirmour (H.P.) 173030

marketing.address: Mantra City, Ranipur Range, Haridwar, Uttrakhand, Pin-249403

reviews.comment: This medicine worked very well for my pain relief. No major side effects. Highly recommended!
दवा प्रभावी है, लेकिन इसे लेने के बाद थोड़ी नींद आ जाती है।
Great product! Helped me recover quickly from muscle pain.
दर्द से राहत मिली और कोई गंभीर साइड इफेक्ट्स नहीं हुए।
